author: Simon Difford
description: We were recommended this cocktail with the comment that it tastes like an alcoholic "cola cube sweet." It does.
name: Beautiful Beth
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
45 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
